input_type.script:
#!/bin/bash
# # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # SCRIPT INFO # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
#Name: BuildEA #Version: 1.0 #Date: 12JAN2018 #Author: LW #Purpose: Gets build type for Jamf EA #Ver history: 1.0 - Initial
# # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # VARIABLES # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
macmd_plist="/usr/local/MacMD/MacMD.plist" qmac_plist="/Library/Preferences/com.quintiles.QMac.plist"
# # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # MAIN # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # # #
if [ -f "${macmd_plist}" ]; then build=$(defaults read "${macmd_plist}" Build) elif [ -f ${qmac_plist} ]; then build="QMAC" else build="Unknown" fi
if [ -n "${build}" ]; then echo "<result>${build}</result>" fi
exit 0
